location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 3102 of 1865 from Charles Gonne, Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay Castle to Lewis Pelly, Political Resident Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing a copy of letter No. 196 of 1865 to the Government of India giving the recommendations which Pelly made regarding the situation in Omman [Oman]:Letter No. 196 of 1865 from Charles Gonne to the Secretary for Government of India in the Foreign Department, Fort William 19 December 1865 referring to them Pelly's requests for naval support and financial assistance for the Sultan of Muscat in dealing with the Wahabees [Wahhabis].
